verses.name: Isaiah 13:1
verses.text: The burden of Babylon, which Isaiah the son of Amoz did see.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:2
verses.text: Lift ye up a banner upon the high mountain, exalt the voice unto them, shake the hand, that they may go into the gates of the nobles.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:3
verses.text: I have commanded my sanctified ones, I have also called my mighty ones for mine anger, even them that rejoice in my highness.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:4
verses.text: The noise of a multitude in the mountains, like as of a great people; a tumultuous noise of the kingdoms of nations gathered together: the Lord of hosts mustereth the host of the battle.
